title: Keeping it simple by XYZT
description: IntroductionIn this notebook, I go through how I worked to find a decent solution for this challenge using simple uncomplicated techniques. No machine learning, no fancy black-box models. Throw away your ARIMAs and Gradient Boosts. Think simple.
